text: @ Indicate which of the following statements are true: 20 Arelational database which is in 3NF may still have undesirable data redundancy because @ there may exist: A. Transitive functional dependencies B. Non-trivial functional dependencies involving prime attributes on the right-side. C. Non-trivial functional dependencies involving prime attributes only on the left-side. D. Non-trivial functional dependencies involving only prime attributes. oDED
